com.wishcan.www.vocabulazy.storage

Class Preferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wishcan.www.vocabulazy.storage.Preferences

  • public class Preferences
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by allencheng07 on 2016/4/14. The object is for storing the volatile arguments and parameters, which should be separated from the @Database object.
